title: Coordinate Train Loading
description: A train has arrived at the intermodal yard to be loaded with containers for an inland destination.

tasks.description: Receive the train's consist (list of railcars) and the list of containers to be loaded.
tasks.expected_outcome: Rail planner has the full work order for the train.

tasks.description: Generate a sequence of moves for the rail-mounted gantry (RMG) cranes to load the containers onto the correct railcars.
tasks.expected_outcome: An optimized work queue is created for the RMG crane operators.

tasks.description: Dispatch the work to the crane operators and track the progress of the train loading.
tasks.expected_outcome: Work instructions are sent, and the planner monitors the loading in real-time.
